title: Copper Climbs as Supreme Court Strikes Down Trump’s Tariffs
description: Copper climbed in London, tracking gains in US stock markets after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping reciprocal tariffs, which have weighed heavily on the outlook for global trade.
content: Copper climbed in London, tracking gains in US stock markets after the US Supreme Court struck down President Donald Trump’s sweeping reciprocal tariffs, which have weighed heavily on the outlook for global trade.
